column2: Traffic;Sihanoukville:------ Three people were seriously injured after a head on collision between trucks on National Highway 4 in Thmor Raam
column3: Banteay Trach Commune.------The accident happened at 11:20 pm on September 11
column10: coming from the opposite direction.------After the accident
column11: the local police force and the provincial military force came to the rescue. The injured were taken to a hospital emergency. Both vehicles were taken to the provincial traffic office
column12: waiting for the case to be resolved.------https://tvfb.news/article/14168------
